documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 1
documents.description: Part 1 of the official U.S. Air Force Project Grudge report issued in August 1949, succeeding Project Sign, detailing the initial assessment and investigation procedures for Unidentified Flying Objects.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 2
documents.description: Part 2 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, continuing the analysis of UFO sighting data and technical evaluations conducted by Air Force personnel.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 3
documents.description: Part 3 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, containing case files and astronomical analysis regarding specific aerial phenomena reports.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 4
documents.description: Part 4 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, featuring further documentation and psychological analysis of witnesses involved in UFO sightings.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 5
documents.description: Part 5 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, continuing the comprehensive review of unidentified aerial objects recorded by the Air Force.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 6
documents.description: Part 6 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, detailing additional case summaries and investigative findings regarding the UFO phenomenon.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 7
documents.description: Part 7 of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, covering late-stage analysis and appendices related to the Air Force's investigation into flying discs.

documents.title: Project Grudge August 1949 Part 8
documents.description: Part 8 (Final) of the August 1949 Project Grudge report, containing the summary, conclusions, and recommendations regarding the future of UFO investigations.
